channel.title: Cybersecurity on The Arboreal Repository
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on The Arboreal Repository

item.title: Progress Update pwn.college
item.description: Faster Than Expected I’ve been going a little faster than expected - probably because I’ve been more time than originally planned - through pwn.college. Linux Luminarium got finished on 2024-09-19, 7 days sooner than the 10 challenges/day rate I had on my original table, and it seems like Optional Refreshers will also be finished ahead of even the fastest timeline. It’s been too much fun and I’ve been learning too much to want to put it down.

item.title: Enrolling at pwn.college
item.description: pwn.college “pwn.college is an education platform for students (and other interested parties) to learn about, and practice, core cybersecurity concepts in a hands-on fashion. In martial arts terms, it is designed to take a “white belt” in cybersecurity through the journey to becoming a “blue belt”, able to approach (simple) cybersecurity competitions (CTFs) and wargames. Our philosophy is “practice makes perfect”. The platform is maintained by an awesome team of hackers at Arizona State University.
